title.narrative: Deutscher Beitrag zum Evidence and Data for Gender Equality (EDGE) joint programme
Evidence and Data for Gender Equality (EDGE) joint programme

description.narrative: Entwicklung einer Plattform für intern. Daten und Metadaten mit Indikatoren zu Gesundheitsgrundversorgung, Bildung und Beschäftigung

The programme's overall objective is to support the generation of comparable gender indicators and to facilitate mainstreaming of gender statistics in national statistical systems. It seeks to achieve three expected outcomes. A) Comparable gender indicators on health, education and employment are compiled to support evidence based policy formulation.
